Summary: Seen a hammer head shaped object with abt 20 or so lights fly slowly across the sky.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Paris
There were no other sightings in Paris on or around June 15th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSeen a Hammer Head Shaped Object with abt 20 plus or so lights and one huge oval shaped light in its center fly slowly across the sky ... was walking form my communities Mailbox area when i spotted the object .. i had to glance at it for abt 30 seconds before it sunk in that i was looking at something unusual ... I finally started shouting to the other people who were on the Porches to come see and when we all looked at it .. relized it was Humming .. with a tingy Horn Sound it was moving way way slow and wasn't moving in any direction or side to side or nothing then it slowly started to move off .. at abt 10 minutes in to seeing it Turned on its Side Vertically and kept moving into the same direction gradually gaining altitude until we lost site of it....
